title: The buildable reservations if any, on plots abutting Metro Station interchanges shall cease to exist on identification of such Metro Station interchanges within 500 m from such interchange to that extent, subject to condition that minimum 20% of plot area shall be kept reserved for parking lot, which can be developed under accommodation reservation policy under regulation 17(1)
clause_text: The buildable reservations if any, on plots abutting Metro Station interchanges shall cease to exist on identification of such Metro Station interchanges within 500 m from such interchange to that extent, subject to condition that minimum 20% of plot area shall be kept reserved for parking lot, which can be developed under accommodation reservation policy under regulation 17(1). However the non-buildable (open spaces) reservations shall be implemented to the full extent. No land shall be used as a site for the construction of building â€“
